short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is for Mount Vernon School students and gives you letter grades on altitude when you hover over your percentage grade

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For Mount Vernon students only, this extension converts percentage grades to corresponding letter grades on Altitude. No setup required - simply hover over your percentage grade to see the letter grade instantly.
